Title: I love coding, obviously.
Body: Coding is one of the things I love the most. For some reason I cannot explain, the fact of writing the code and watch it work is something that passions me.
There is nothing comparable to fresh air. I like to ride my bike, go for a walk in the woods, and climb mountains.
I really enjoy music at all times. It doesn't matter if I'm working, riding my bike, or trying to sleep. My favorite band? The Beatles, of course.
I love science fiction and horror stories. My favorite author is Stephen King, with him, I never know how the story is going to end. My favorite book, The Running Man.
I love horror movies. Before the pandemic, I went to the movies every weekend. I love the experience of watching a movie on a giant screen while eating popcorn.
Nothing better than hang out with friends while we face against people around the world.
